channel.title: Steam on sbondLog
channel.description: Recent content in Steam on sbondLog

item.title: Steam Library Update Beta
item.description: Enabling Library Update To enable the new library update you can just, go to Steam > Account > Change (on Beta Participation) > Steam Beta Update: How It Feels I definitley think that this is a step up from the previous UI, which is super outdated, but there are a few things missing and I hope that they aren’t forgotten about when this is fully released.
